Blog

Submodules

blog.views module

Import the modules render, HttpResponse, ListView, DetailView, Post, and login_required.

blog.views.post_detail(DetailView)[source]

View function for displaying an individual blog post.

Parameters:

DetailView (django.views.generic.DetailView) – The DetailView instance.

Returns:

The rendered template post.html.

Return type:

django.http.HttpResponse

Returns:

The rendered template blog.html.

django.http.HttpResponse
